name: get_time_zones
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool world_country.
Tool description: More than 200+ countries, 5K states and 150K cities with various information.
API description: Fetch a list of time zones based on certain search criteria.

is_id.description: The ID of the time zone to filter by. Defaults to None.

keyword.description: The keyword to search for in the time zones. Defaults to 'asia'.

page.description: The page number for pagination. Defaults to 1.

perpage.description: The number of records per page for pagination. Defaults to 50.
